# The Gallant King

|director       = Alfred Halm
|producer       = Leonhard Fanto
|writer         = Alfred HalmHermann von Schmeling
|music          = Vizenz ReisnerOtto Schmid
|cinematography = Franz MeineckeGeorg Muschner
|studio         = Messter Film
|distributor    = UFA
|released       =
|runtime        =
|country        = Germany
|language       = SilentGerman intertitles
}}
The Gallant King () is a 1920 German silent historical drama film directed by Alfred Halm. It is based on the life of the eighteenth century monarch Augustus the Strong. His story was later made into a 1936 sound film Augustus the Strong.
